question:
You need to create a JSP that generates some JavaScript code to populate an array of strings
used on the client-side. Which JSP code snippet will create this array?

options.A: MY_ARRAY = new Array(); <% for ( int i = 0; i < serverArray.length; i++ ) { MY_ARRAY[<%= i %>] = ‘<%= serverArray[i] %>’; } %>
options.B: MY_ARRAY = new Array(); <% for ( int i = 0; i < serverArray.length; i++ ) { MY_ARRAY[${i}] = ‘${serverArray[i]}’; } %>
options.C: MY_ARRAY = new Array(); <% for ( int i = 0; i < serverArray.length; i++ ) { %> MY_ARRAY[<%= i %>] = ‘<%= serverArray[i] %>’; <% } %>
options.D: MY_ARRAY = new Array(); <% for ( int i = 0; i < serverArray.length; i++ ) { %> MY_ARRAY[${i}] = ‘${serverArray[i]}’; <% } %>
